casebody.data:
Charles R. JORDAN, Petitioner, v. DEPARTMENT OF LABOR, Respondent. No. 01-3349. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. Oct. 11, 2002.

Before RADER, Circuit Judge, ARCHER, Senior Circuit Judge, and SCHALL, Circuit Judge.

*333JUDGMENT

PER CURIAM.

This CAUSE having been heard and considered it is ORDERED and ADJUDGED:

AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R. 36.
